title: A city break stay in the big Apple
text: We have just come back from a five night stay at the Hotel Eventi. We had no complaints from our stay. The hotel appeared as fairly clean throughout. We had a room on the 12th floor and although we requested a room away from elevators we took room 1208. It was not directly next to elevators and we did not encounter any noise. We had two queen beds in the room, access to a large TV, a walk in shower, a closet, and a clean sink and toilet. Plenty of space in the bathroom. There was also some bits and bobs if you forgot them. A good range of clean towels were also provided. I did notice some staining on some of the bedding one night when I got into it but it was not a major issue. On a morning you could access free coffee which we did to get us going. This was nice but would have been great to have a differing option suitable for children. We never really made the wine hours as we were often out sightseeing. The hotel stored our cases on the last day so we could explore Central Park. It has a great location this hotel with good access to subways and Penn Station. Plenty of things round about also. We dined in Skirt one evening and had a set steak meal and this was good also.

title: Excellent Service - Great Location
text: Another excellent Kimpton stay! We loved the Chelsea location.  Our room was clean, comfortable, and unexpectedly spacious. Kathy from housekeeping went out of her way to keep up with our week-long visit...leaving fun notes, and even an extra treat! Service all around was exceptional. My husband and son especially enjoyed chatting with Dino, and the gracious doormen and valets!

title: Great hotel and very accommodating for our wedding guests
text: We chose the Eventi as one of the hotels for our out-of-town guests to our wedding.  Several other hotels we had contacted were unresponsive, barely offered us any discount for our courtesy block, and wanted us to agree to strange indemnification terms.   We were pretty put off, but our call to the Eventi was a welcome relief.  Elliot in sales was incredibly responsive, offered us a very reasonable rate, and sent a straightforward contract.  In the weeks leading up to the wedding, the reservations desk sent us regular updates of the reserved guests in our block for planning/gift purposes.  And everything we heard from our guests was extremely positive.  The rooms are very comfortable and more spacious than others in the area.  The staff was friendly and helpful.  And everybody loved the restaurant (L'Amico).  We are so glad we  got in touch with the Eventi and thankful to the team for making it such a seamless and positive experience for everyone.

title: Just book it and thank me later.
text:
Wow, what a fabulous hotel!  Just had 5 days in NYC and we are so glad we chose this hotel. The location is great, far enough away from the chaos of Times Sq, but close to the subway and PATH, 5th Ave shopping, Hudson Yards, and ESB, not to mention the Sixth Ave Gourmet Garden Deli a block away - a great spot for a breakfast BEC). The rooms were a good size for Manhattan, and were spotlessly clean. The bed was the most comfortable I’ve ever slept on in a hotel. We had lunch at L’Amico and that was delicious, and the Back Bar is a comfortable, stylish and chilled place for evening drinks - thanks to whoever put together the playlist in there too. 

However, the real stars of the hotel are, as always, the staff. You are guaranteed a friendly welcome, but they recognise the value in getting tired travellers checked in and to their room quickly and efficiently. On the day we were leaving, I asked if they could store our bags until we left, but they told us to just keep the room until we were ready. It’s little things like that which make a stay so much more than standard. They also offered a luxury transfer to JFK for a better price than I had seen it anywhere. Finally, the biggest shoutout has to go to the housekeeping guys. We came back to our room each day and it looked like it did when we checked in. That is so welcome when you come back tired after a day of exploring. 

Thank you, Team Kimpton Eventi, you made our stay in NYC very special. 

The Johnson family.

title: The friendliest staff, the best hotel...a beacon of excellence
text:
Without a doubt, the Kimpton Eventi stands as a towering beacon of excellence amidst the vibrant hustle and bustle of New York City. As I reflect on my experiences, I find myself at a loss for where to begin, so let me simply proclaim: this is, unequivocally, my favorite haven in the heart of the Big Apple!

This place has become my go-to spot in the city, and let me tell you why.

First off, the location is unbeatable. You're smack dab near all the good stuff: Empire State Building, Madison Square Garden, Koreatown, Macy's, Penn Station, Herald Square, Madison Square Park—you name it, it's close by. Convenience level? A solid 10/10.

But let's talk about what really makes the Eventi shine: the people. Shoutout to Victoria and the whole crew for making every stay feel like coming home. Seriously, these folks go above and beyond to make sure you're comfy and happy. They possess an innate ability to anticipate your needs, surpass your expectations, and make you feel cherished, valued, and most importantly, at home. Service and hospitality is an 11/10. (yes, 11/10)

And don't even get me started on the views and the rooms.  Super luxurious, clean and incredible views. Rooms and views, a solid 10/10! 

Long story short, my loyalty to the Eventi is not merely a product of its opulent amenities or enviable location—it is a testament to the incomparable warmth and hospitality that permeates every corner of this extraordinary establishment. For anyone seeking an unforgettable sojourn in the heart of New York City, look no further than the Kimpton Eventi. Your journey begins here, and I promise you, it will be nothing short of extraordinary.

title: Fantastic place!
text: Fernando was absolutely outstanding! So helpful the entire week we were in NYC. He was so lovely entertaining our children! The Eventi was beautiful and so accommodating! Thank you! Can’t wait to come back! Thankkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkks!

title: Great location and staff.
text: Excellent location. Extremely helpful and friendly staff; especially Will & Urbano. Would definitely stay here again and would recommend to family and friends. Rooms are spacious, beds were comfortable. Bathroom had a shower and tub. Good water pressure.

title: The best staff and clean comfortable room!!
text: First impression walking up was it was very classy looking. Loved the ambience when we walked in. The staff was incredibly kind and so helpful always smiling and even remembered our name when we came down later to ask a question. The rooms were super clean and inviting . Beds were very comfortable. We slept absolutely wonderful.  I definitely have to say their door guys that open the door for you in and out of the hotel, were  exceptionally friendly, like above and beyond helping us navigate where to go and greeted us every time with the biggest smile  one of the guys named Will was definitely The kindest guy and employee I’ve met at any hotel I’ve ever been to. You can tell he has a great rapport with people that walk in and that says a lot about the hotel. We will be back without a doubt for sure. Felt like home for the days we spent there. Thank you for making our first time in  New York perfect.

title: Great Hotel, Awesome Vibe—Made Even Better By the Caring, Personal Staff!
text: From the very first moment we stepped on property, Will and Fernando were there every step of our trip to NYC to make sure my family was cared for and taken care of. They knew us by name, chatted with us every day, and made us feel like we were family staying with them in their home—and not just hotel guests. Pair that with the awesome, chic vibe of the hotel, and we couldn’t have been more pleased with our stay at the Kimpton Eventi. When you arrive, immediately seek out Will and Fernando (if they don’t greet you first already), and enjoy feeling like a VIP for your entire stay!

title: Go-to NYC Hotel
text: Love this hotel!! I stay here when I come to nyc. I stay here a few times a year, for business and leisure and also book our company’s annual NYC roadshow with their amazing sales team (shout out to Elliot and Stephanie!) The location is perfect for business and leisure as it’s so central. The food is delicious, the staff is very helpful and service is wonderful and friendly, hotel is clean and spacious.

title: Valet & Door Service Is Exceptional
text: Will, Francisco, and Kurt went above and beyond to be sure our 4-month-old baby boy was cared for and that our entirely family had an enjoyable visit. Tip these guys, bump up their salaries, and give them praise. They’re making the hotel stand out.

title: Great Location Great Service
text: The location of Hotel was great.  Overall  experience was 5 stars.  Will at the front door/ Valet was very helpful, friendly and great customer service from arriving at Kimpton to checking out. Diane at the front desk was pleasant and accommodating.

title: Kind. Helpful. Clean.
text: Beautiful hotel. I loved that I could tell where the hotel was/how far away it was while I was walking just by looking for the iconic mass lightbulb entrance. It’s walking distance to great spots, including this yummy Korean restaurant that was recommended to me, Osamil. Urbano, was sooooo kind, helpful, and a joy. He waited with me for my Uber and carried all my bags / opened all the doors. Such a gentleman!

title: Staff are lovely
text: I loved it! Beautifully decorated! Staff were so nice, especially Urbano, Will, and Jen. They made us feel so at home and welcomed. I will definitely be returning after experiencing their hospitality. You can tell they care about the guests they are attending to.

title: Great stay in the city
text:
Really great experience- clean room, friendly staff and the on site eats were good. 

The location was perfect- could walk to almost everything we needed either uptown or downtown.

The doorman / bellman Will was exceptional and remembered us each time we came back. Provided excellent directions and helped make it a great experience

title: Great option near Penn Station
text:
I needed a place to stay for one night and wanted to be close to Penn Station to take the train to EWR. I love Kimptons and thought I would give this a try. The staff were all so friendly throughout my short stay. At check-in they asked my preference in terms of a view or quieter room, and I ended up on a nice high floor with a great view of the city. 

The room was very clean and comfortable, and the bathroom is quite large with a fantastic shower (overhead and handheld both had good water pressure too). There was a good selection of snacks in the mini bar, free wine happy hour in the afternoon, and coffee/tea in the morning in the lobby. The lobby and restaurant areas are lovely with plenty of comfortable places to relax.

The location is very convenient and close to multiple subway lines along with Penn Station. Generally I prefer a little bit of a quieter neighborhood when I’m in NY, but I would definitely stay here again!

title: The stay was fabulous
text: The hotel was fabulous. Food was amazing and the staff was great. Urbano was so helpful and great with assisting us with everything we needed. The hotel staff would go up and beyond for all your services.  The restaurants owned my Chef LT were absolutely delicious. Defiantly coming back here again when in NY.

title: Fantastic hotel, friendly staff, amazing location
text: Fantastic hotel with an amazing location. Will, the doorman was outstanding! Made our visit that much more pleasurable! The staff are friendly, rooms are clean and comfortable. Nice restaurant downstairs at lobby though we didn’t dine there. Food looked good though!

title: Best in NYC
text: Great location, clean, and Will at the front was absolutely amazing!! He made the experience the most welcoming and enjoyable, always greeting us with a smile and a laugh. Made the hotel feel like home during our stay. 10/10 staying here again.

title: The best experience (again!)
text: This was our second stay here. We stayed in a king deluxe which is a very big space (more than big enough for two adults a pack and play crib and a dog bed!). We this hotel partly for the modern space/bar/restaurant in the lobby, the nice gym and spacious rooms but the biggest assess this hotel has is its staff. They are NEXT LEVEL, Urbano makes you feel like a VIP from the moment you enter the hotel. Faustina was our housekeeper and she was just THE BEST! Nothing is a problem for the staff in this hotel and they go the extra mile to make your stay restful, fun, and memorable. I don’t think we could stay anywhere else in NYC…5 star experience!

title: Stayed for a three day business trip. Accommodations were fine but customer service and guest services were outstanding
text: Urbano Estevez was pleasant professional and very helpful during our stay. Hire 5 more like him! Urbano secured our car and assisted us with luggage. The guest services overall were great. Check in staff were knowledgeable and friendly. I only wish our room had been ready at check in but otherwise a great stay.

title: Great hotel in Manhattan
text:
Positives: Newer building, very nice bar, did not try restaurant, very nice rooms with good amenities, adaptable and good cleaning service,  great and helpful staff, efficient transportation planning, great area (not 
 far from time square, right next to Korea town,) 

Negatives: have to pay for movies (can’t sign into Netflix or any other streaming services which is pretty standard these days)

title: A great choice in Chelsea
text:
Great experience overall. The staff was very friendly and helpful. Loved the doorman, Wills, and Fernando; engaging and always a smile on their face. 
The room was clean and in good condition. Love the restaurant next door, L’amica. Great value for the price.

title: The best Staff ever!!
text: Urbano (the Urban Legend) and Will were soooo incredibly helpful and kind during my trip. I seriously was so wow’d by their generosity and can’t recommend them enough !! They are the best!!!! If you g, please ask for them because they will help you with anything you need.

title: Great customer service
text: Urbano and Will great customer service. Was very friendly. They were polite and explained the hotel polices and what you offer. I was very pleased with the experience and will be returning and telling my business partners and coworkers to also visit

title: Will The Thrill and Urbano the Urban Legend
text: Will “The Thrill” and Urbano “The Urban Legend” literally made my stay awesome. It’s kind of crazy that doormen made my stay at an hotel one of the most memorable trips to Manhattan I’ve had but these guys are great. Genuinely great human beings who clearly love their jobs. Thanks guys!

title: Best bellmen
text: Will and Derek the two bellmen were an absolute delight. Everything was on point but the two of them went beyond expectations to accommodate my stay. I came for the cassoulet competition hosted by Dartagan and although I was traveling for work I felt like I was on vacation thanks to their hospitality

title: Nice stay
text: Nice hotel and all staff encountered were nice. Relatively quiet inside the room all things considered but I could hear a bit of hallway noise in the morning. Door is easy to miss though. We walked right past it the first time lol. Would stay again if in the area.

title: Great staff and amazing location
text:
Staff was incredible especially Victoria and Zhandra.  Everyone went out of their way to be very helpful. The rooms are spacious and the beds are so comfy.

You know a hotel is great when all of the patrons are happy and smiling. Every person I ran into on the elevator was so happy, especially this person referred to as «Anna’s Freind»,  that’s what the T shirt said.

I will book this hotel the next time my family is traveling to NYC.

title: Perfect hotel in NYC
text:
Much appreciated that they listen to my request for the highest room, best view and most quiet one.  We’ve a got a corner room on 21st floor with a bang on view of Empire State!

There is a minor glitch on the last night of our stay, the housekeeping was not up to the standard of the usual clean, they left our dirty mugs and didn’t replace it with clean ones, I’ve raised this issue on the text message, and immediately they fixed the faulty and gave us a compensation, highly appreciate with their quick response on text! 

All in all, the location of Kimpton Eventi is perfect, smooth check in and out, the Back Bar has delicious cocktails, spacious room for NY standard, clean room, warm & friendly staffs and last but not least, MAJOR SHOUT OUT TO OUR BELOVED DOORMAN, WILL!!!
He made our stay felt safe & warm.
Definitely a place to comeback to whenever we are in town.

title: Excellent excellent excellent and excellent
text: It was a great time. I will suggest this place to all my friends. I like the one in Philadelphia. I stayed at the one in Philadelphia on my honeymoon in 2021. We had a great room with a jacuzzi in our room. The decor was amazing and the staff was awesome

title: Great friendly service!
text: We loved the hotel. Good location and nice style. Very sweet daily happy hour free wine! The restaurant is.very yummy!  Very quiet and comfortable. Will and Urbana were such help! What great service.  I would recommend to anyone looking for a more unique hotel.

title: Eventi, Dinner, L’Amico, Doorman (Will)
text:
It was a pleasure to go to the restaurant and enjoy the food and ambiance. L’Amico has great food despite me not being a cheese eat person. But one of the highlights of us stopping in for a bite was The doorman Will. Very welcoming, professional, funny and kind. If you happen to be in the area stop in and see Will the doorman. He will surely provide you with 5 star service. Thank you for your service, help and information. 

Crystal Vargas

title: Perfect two night getaway location next to Amtrak station in midtown.
text: Came in for a midweek Valentine’s visit. Excellent service and hospitality from Jose at the front desk and Syah. These two are the best in the business. Highly recommend location, amenities and the concierge service for dinner reservations.

title: Awesome staff and service
text: The Kimpton Hotel was such a great spot for this short trip.   We travel to the city a few times a year and this hotel was by far our favorite spot.  The aesthetic was perfect it had a nice bar and restaurant on lower floor and a lounge area for waiting for your room to be ready.  The hotel was clean and from arrival to departure Will and Fernando treated our family like their family.  We will definitely be returning!

title: Amazing
text: Hotel was great but Will and Fernando helped us out sonic with car and luggage . Iam not from NY but these guys helped me out so much and made my stay painless . I will def be back to stay here . Comming to a place where employees take care of you is the world of difference .

title: Great stay
text: The hotel was awesome!!! Great location!  Great esthetic!! Will and Fernando were so helpful to us and welcoming!! We will definitely be back! The hospitality was outstanding! The bar area has a great vibe and everything was clean and updated!

title: Will is a true gentleman
text: Will is amazing.  It is special to be greeted by him when arriving at the hotel.  A true gentleman. He is kind,  thoughtful and genuine.  The hotel could not have a better ambassador.  I would seriously go back just because of the hospitality and kindness he showed myself and my family during our visit.    All around a great experience, with Will at the highlight!  Thank you!

title: Great door/porter service
text: Will the doorman is great! He helped me a lot! He helped me move luggage with ease from my vehicle to my room. He was quite friendly, cheerful, and generally great to work with. Nice work! Thanks for helping me move a lot of cloths from a car to my room!

title: Recent Stay
text: My stay at Eventi was great. The service was amazing, everyone was very personable. Will the doorman was always smiling and great with our family. The room was spacious and clean, and the lobby was nice! My family and I will be returning asap.

title: Urbano, Emily and entire Eventi staff unbelievable
text: The staff, service and level of service were off the charts. Urbano and Emily went above and beyond. The lounge and back bar staff only validated the above and beyond service. The security and safety of the hotel made it a great place to walk in anytime of day or night.

title: Will be my go to hotel in NY
text: Fantastic! The room was solid and there was no noise and I slept very well. In addition the service was great! Urbano and Will were such gems and made my departure so smooth. Everyone was great. Perfect location to get to my office and to do fun things after as well. I will definitely stay here again.

title: Super friendly kind staff
text: The staff are super helpful and friendly and kind , one colleague helped me into the hotel with my luggage and another Urbano helped me to my room with my luggage! Check in was super quick and easy and I  got a free glass of wine at check in. The location is super central and easy to get to

title: Will the doorman is the best!
text: The hotel was great. This was our fifth stay. The central location is perfect for our needs. Will the doorman was especially gracious and put a smile on our face each time we saw him! He definitely represent the hotel with. Lass and enthusiasm.

title: Beautiful and great we love it here
text: The doorman Mr will Brooks here at the Eventi was great and well knowledge of the Hotel and very great with the guests that come here. Mr will with is Grace and smile yes we will come back again the hotel is clean and the staff was very helpful and friendly I would like to thank them all for making me and my wife very comfortable here  also the rooms were very clean and comfortable I love it and I would recommend this place to all my friends and family to come stay here Thank you Eventi Staff and all doorman’s working here

title: Best hotel experience!
text: This is our third time to stay at The Eventi and we could not have been more satisfied. Everything from the cleanliness of the rooms to the hospitality went above and beyond our expectations. We can’t wait to be back!

title: Amazing staff, great location, comfy
text: Had an amazing stay at the Kimtpon Eventi. Staff is so friendly and helpful. Shout out to Urbano and Will, they are amazing!! Extremely helpful, always kind, thanks guys. Location is perfect, very central. We definitely will be staying here again.

title: Worn hotel but good service, nice people
text: Liked the service very much. I believe they really wanted us to have a good stay, which we mostly did. Nothing wrong with this hotel. It’s just worn. Carpets need to be changed. Beds were old and lumpy. One can tell right away when the elevator buttons are worn and need replacement.

title: Excellent Service by Will at the door
text:
Stayed at Kimpton Eventi for a week on a work trip.
I received Excellent Service by Will at the Door. 
Hotel lobby and rooms are clean. Nice atmosphere. Really good food at Amico. Also, good to join the free  IHG membership for points towards hotel stays.

title: Impeccable Service! Will the doorman is the best!
text: The service at kimpton eventi is some of the best I’ve experienced in Manhattan. Will the doorman is the best! Saved me from getting run over by a bike, got my checked bags in seconds flat and had my car ready right after. I will definitely come back and enjoy the impeccable service.

title: Great Hotel, great service
text: We’d like to express our thanks for your help and exceptional service of your staff during our recent visit to the Kimpton Hotel Eventi.  We enjoyed excellent service every morning at breakfast with a very attentive waiter and staff.  The front desk was delightful and even remembered us from a previous visit.

title: Kimpton Hotel Eventi
text: We have stayed at a Kimpton Brand before but never at the Kimpton Eventi.  However after staying here for the last three nights, we had an amazing time. Unfortunately we are checking out today. But we will definitely be back soon! The front desk was superb at check in, offering us an upgrade for a fee (which is standard for almost an IHG tier status) .Our feline companion signed his check in slip too. Then Fernando the bell hop assisted us with bringing our luggage up to our room, a very kind & professional bell hop. Upon entering the room everything was in order, clean and ready for our stay. The minibar was stocked too. Overall, an amazing stay at a hotel we've never been to before. We will definitely be looking forward to seeing to again soon! Thank you Victoria, and the whole Kimpton Eventi team!

title: Great Service and staff
text:
Great service! We enjoyed our stay, Fernando at the front desk was very friendly and helpful during our stay. Thanks to all the staff including Stephenson who was great fun. 

The hotel is a great location for exploring all that New York has to offer.

title: Amazing stay at Xmas time
text: We always stay at the Kimpton hotels and we were so excited to book the Hotel Eventi in NYC. This hotel is absolutely beautiful and in a great location. The staff checked in with us to make sure we had everything we needed and made us feel very welcome. Love the special touches like the complimentary wine for their social hour. The restaurants are amazing, our breakfast was also wonderful and the staff there was great. The gentlemen that work as the door man and valet, Will and Derick are awesome.  Both so nice, attentive,  funny, and our boys thought Will was the best. He has the best personality.  Christmas time in NYC will be one of our all time  favorite trips and this hotel was a huge part of why. We will definitely be back. Thanks again ;)

title: This is a great hotel
text: Will, Jen, and Derek in the lobby are customer service heroes. They all went above and beyond to make our stay extra special. We will be coming back to the Eventi because of the amazing employees and service. It's hard to feel at home in a big city, but the kimpton is welcoming and comfortable beyond expectation.

title: Kindness at the Kimpton Hotel Eventi, NYC
text: We loved staying at the Kimpton Hotel Eventi in NYC. We were immediately met by the most welcoming doorman, Will. He was such a help to us during our stay. His positive vibe and smile made our trip extra special. Derrick the doorman was so nice and accommodating as well! All the hotel staff were great. Our room was very comfortable, and we had everything we needed. We enjoyed dinner at L'Amico restaurant before we left. The service was terrific, and we loved our seafood pasta dishes. We can't wait to come back!

title: Best Hotel in NYC
text: Stayed at the Eventi many times at it’s always great.  Doorman Will was especially helpful on this trip. Will assisted with a special request.  And Wen from housekeeping kept my room well stocked. Loved the happy hour too. Highly recommend staying here when in NYC.

title: Great service by Will the door man !
text: Will the doorman is the best ! He was so helpful with everything from restaurant recommendations to directions. We needed a reservation for a special occasion for a large group and he came through for us in a bind! Thanks for making our stay great.

title: Great Hotel!
text: We enjoyed our stay so much! The staff was so friendly and accommodating throughout the entire stay. Special shout-out to Will who greeted us and provided valet service and was so welcoming and helpful. The lobby has a great vibe and the drinks at the bar were great. Also a great location with lots of food options around. Would recommend!

title: Best Bellman Urbano
text: We had an amazing New York City stay thanks to Urbano the best bellman. The hotel is top notch great amenities . The view was breathtaking especially the sunset. We would definitely stay again and recommend to all our family and friends.

title: Urbana Estevez the best of the best
text: Urbano Estevez was excellent in helping us and making sure we were comfortable and very happy with the service. He made the experience worth wild by delivering excellent customer service. I loved my stay as well.

title: Best in the area
text: Our new favorite NYC hotel.  Great location, safe neighborhood.  Very upscale accomodations and terriffic staff.  Much higher level of hotel and service than other IHG properties in the area.  We have stayed several times and are always impressed.  Don't hesitate to stay here or be tempted to stay elsewhere for a little less.  You won't be disappointed.

title: Great stay!
text:
Great location, friendly service and clean rooms.

We loved both L’Amico and Back Bar and would return.

Shout out to Will the front doorman who always had a friendly greeting and a helpful hand to offer!

title: Great vibe, great restaurants, rooms need some thought.
text:
Great vibe, great restaurants, rooms need some thought. 
Pros:
Great location & walkable from Penn Station
The vibe was cool and the restaurant and bar were great. The cocktails were very impressive

Cons:
The room was very dim. If you want to be able to do much work indoor room you'll have to do it a dark room.

Room was cold w/ no extra blankets. I ended up having to call down for a blanket because the room was so chilly. It was winter but the bedding was still pretty thin. They brought up a blanket quickly but it was pretty worn out and not very comfortable. 

The robes were "cool" but not very cozy.  They were made out of a denim-like material. Maybe just stick with the classic cozy hotel robes?

Looks of street noise even on the 17th floor. The hotel is right next to a police station so if you're sensitive to noise bring a sound machine.

title: Great place to stay!
text: Great room and location.  Very quiet and comfortable beds and bigger for NYC.  Thr staff were great including Roman and Charles.  Both those gentlemen were the best. The manager likewise did his best to take care of folks.  I'll definitely stay here again when I visit NYC.

title: Come Visit
text: Stayed here with my kids while visiting NYC for Thanksgiving. Stay was exceptional from check-in to check-out. Staff is great, rooms are beautiful and restaurant is a must visit. Hotel is also ideally located by Herald Square which made enjoying the Thanksgiving Day parade a breeze and unique. Come stay here!

title: Will has the BEST customer service!
text: Will at the front with valet was the best customer service we have had since I can remember. It was an amazing experience and we would definitely recommend a visit here solely based on our experience with him!

title: Enjoyable Experience
text: Welcoming quality staff. Especially a shout out to Will the doorman! He was a delight and made our experience extra special! Wine happy hour and complementary morning coffee were nice touches. Great location overall!

title: Great location and friendly staff
text: Great location for work and sightseeing! Always felt welcomed by the staff, especially Will, the doorman. Always greets with a smile and kindness. Enjoyed the complementary coffee and view of the Empire State Building. The social wine hour is a great plus.

title: Warm, welcoming and professional
text:
The Kimpton Hotel Eventi was a top-notch experience.  We began with a warm and wonderful welcome from Celine.  
All of the staff were friendly and highly professional.   Room was gorgeous and immaculate.  A fantastic weekend celebrating my wife’s birthday.

title: A Wonderful Stay for Me and My Pup
text: My pup and I had a wonderful stay at the Eventi. It’s a beautiful property with very comfortable and bright rooms with nice bathrooms (great shower). The staff is friendly and helpful. They accommodated a couple of small requests promptly and graciously. My stay was a reminder of how nice a hotel stay can be when the “hosts” pay attention to details and make a real effort to make their guests comfortable.

title: MARIA IS THE BEST!
text: Maria is an exceptional wine taster who elevated our experience to new heights. Her depth of knowledge and articulate descriptions guided us through a delightful journey of flavors. Her passion for wine is infectious, making the tasting not just informative but also incredibly enjoyable. A true connoisseur, Maria's expertise adds an invaluable dimension to any wine tasting event. Highly recommended for an unforgettable and educational experience. Cheers to Maria!

title: Incredible Stay at the Kimpton Hotel Eventi — Will Stay Again!
text:
I wanted to share how incredible our stay at the Kimpton Hotel Eventi was. It's easily my favorite NYC hotel experience to date. From the moment we walked in, everyone was so friendly and made us feel really welcome.  Also, it’s super dog-friendly and our French Bulldog Monty was welcomed with opened arms. 

The room we stayed in was just amazing. It was super clean, very modern, and really comfortable. Thanks to Darius for the updated suite.  The view was just outstanding.

But the hotel staff were the best part of our stay. Tara at L'Amico, Will at the lobby door, and all the ladies at the front desk were so nice and made our stay really special. They were always ready to help and made sure we had a great time.

We ate at L’Amico four times, and every meal was so good!  The food was awesome, and the place had a great vibe.

Everything about our stay was top-notch. Whether we needed something from downstairs or needed our room cleaned, everyone was so friendly and helpful.

The hotel's location was perfect, making it easy for us to explore NYC's exciting energy.  It was a luxurious spot to stay while we had fun in the city and attended a family wedding.

Overall, our time at Kimpton Hotel Eventi was just amazing. The great staff, perfect location, and awesome amenities made our trip really special. A big thank you to everyone there for making it so fantastic. We can't wait to come back to this awesome spot in Chelsea.

title: Great hotel with great staff
text: This hotel is in a great location. Rooms are a good size and nice and clean. Steps from anything you need. The staff are exceptional- Will the Doorman will truly ensure you have a 10/10 stay! He made our trip

title: Wonderful stay, excellent service
text: I love this  hotel. It’s convenient, very clean, stylish,  and the rooms are very nice. They have great restaurants and two very nice bars. The rooms are also really quiet, you don’t hear alot of street traffic. New York can be very loud if the windows aren’t insulated. The customer service is excellent. On my last day a young man by the name of Will helped me with my bags and told me I can use the hotels car service which was an excellent idea, For the same price as a basic Uber I was able to ride in a luxury black SUV to the airport The ride was comfortable and I felt very safe. I will stay here every time if I can.

title: Great hospitality from main lobby staff/ doormen
text: Hotel stay was nice. What really set this hotel experience apart was the amazing service and help we got from Staff member Urbano in main lobby throughout our stay. He really seemed to stand out for his exceptional help and friendliness.

title: Business traveler
text: I love this hotel. I come weekly for work, and it feels like home. It and is always so great to help me with my luggage and make sure I stay safe! Both restaurants have amazing service, and there's always a cozy place to work if I want to take a moment to get off my room.

title: Great help from hotel staff
text:
Urbano and Will are the best staff I ever met
With their great help , I had a wonderful experience in kimton hotel.
The room is clean , the view is nice , position is convenient.
Thanks again Urbano and Will.

title: A Pleasant Stay at Kimpton Eventi!
text:
As a Platinum Elite IHG member and also Ambassador member, we usually stay at Intercontinental Barclay, but for this brief trip we thought we would give the Kimpton Eventi a try.  There was much to appreciate about the hotel - easy walk from Penn Station, tall windows, very comfortable bedding, luxury marble bath,  restaurants on the ground level of the building and wood flooring vs wall-to-wall carpeting.
As an IHG Platinum Elite member we were offered the option to pay for an upgrade to a suite at a discount. We were on the 14th floor. It was worth having the extra space and  the view of the Empire State Building was magical.  
We had dinner at L'Amico downstairs and the food was very good - just wish the menu could be expanded and wish that tables for two were not so jammed up against another table for two, but this is typical for NYC.
Nice surprises -  We found a deli next door to the hotel for great breakfast sandwiches at yesteryear prices!  A special thanks to Jennifer at the front desk for gifting us some drink vouchers to help us celebrate our Anniversary.  We would definitely stay here again.

title: 10 out of 10 def recommend
text: Really enjoyed our stay here, with its very central location, connected restaurants (including The Vine and Skirt Steak), really creative and modern decor and the service was excellent. 10 out of 10 definitely would recommend and stay again!

title: Family feel and very clean
text: Will and Fernando are incredible along with the family at kimpton eventi only place I'll stay thank you guys. From the rooms, restaurant to the bar makes you never want to leave can't wait to come back.

title: Great experience!
text: Will and Urbano were fantastic staff members! They helped us with everything we needed and went above and beyond to make sure our stay was exceptional! Great hotel I would definitely recommend to all and stay again.

title: New York 2023 - Kimpton Hotel Eventi
text: Spent a week here on vacation with my family. Great hotel and the staff are really attentive to your needs and are only to happy to help. Suite was large, clean and perfect for our holiday. Only negative is no kettle or coffee making facilities but drinks are available in reception. Ate in both the Vine and L’Amico and both were good. Special mention to Urbano, who sorted our luggage out and organised a car back to JFK for us. Top guy!

title: Will the Doorman - so helpful.
text: We are staying at Hotel Eventi and one of our party is in a wheelchair and Will the Doorman spent well over half an hour trying to flag down an accessible taxi for us. He was polite, kind and chatty and went out of his way for us. One of the best and most helpful people we’ve encountered on our trip.

title: Will we love you
text: We are staying here as a group for a work event! Will the doorman was amazing. My friend is a wheelchair user and spent so much time helping us hail a cab after so many were refusing to help!! A great man!

title: Great location, good value
text: Great location,  walking distance to a lot of tourist spots and easy access to Penn station and Amtrak. The lobby and restaurants are quite beautiful. Rooms are ok, bed is great. The room we were at had big windows and city view. They don’t do out of their way to be accommodating, but the cost/benefit ratio here is very good in general.

title: Nice hotel, good location
text:
Staff was very helpful, especially Urbano and Will, for storing and helping me access our luggage after checkout. They deserve a promotion and raise!

The room was nice too, as well as the gym. And the restaurants and cafe were good

title: Helpful staff!
text:
Will and Urbano were super helpful with our bags and making sure we were accommodated even after checkout. Super friendly staff that made us feel welcome. 

Hotel view of Empire State was a plus too!!

title: Lovely stay, great customer service
text: Had a great visit for a conference, felt very cared for and attended to. Rooms and visuals were immaculate. Urbano and Will especially were very helpful with my bags and other customer services — and so nice! Loved it overall.

title: Great service!
text: Will and Urbano provided the best service during our stay!  I would stay here again.  Thank you for the excellent service. See you in January. Ask for will if you have any service needs while you are on property.

title: Great accommodations in a great location!
text:
We had an amazing stay. The staff at Kimpton were awesome and super accommodating. We had a king shower suite room and it was comfy and fit our group of three plus a dog. 

Wanted to give a quick shout out to Urbano and Will for their excellent service!

title: So great!
text: Thank you Urbana, will and Celine for makin our trip so wonderful.  Celine was the coolest and really took care of us.  Thank you, will be coming back again.  Had the best time, great ppl, great location!

title: Worth the stay
text: Some of the friendliest staff I’ve dealt with at a hotel… especially in a place like New York! Will, Fernando, and Amado we’re lovely to interact with and took great care of us! Would definitely recommend staying here. The price is fair, the location was excellent, and the facilities were clean and spacious.

title: Great hotel with great staff
text:
This is a great hotel with even better staff! From Urbano who helps with bags (thank you!) and Will who is kind at the door and Emily at the front desk - I want to move in!

There is a good vibe here and great rooms and the staff treats you like a human :) - thank you and I want to extend :).

title: Kimpton
text: Awesome hotel!! Will at the door is the best!!! He WILL take of you!!! From luggage to car service!!! This is literally the only hotel I stay at when in Manhattan!! Oh. Also the complimentary coffee in the lobby; better than 90% of all coffee shops near by...

title: Fantastic experience for a big event (engagement)
text: Urbana and Will - both were fantastic and provided great service to us. Urbano helped us find a bag that had been misplaced accidentally - he then also helped another group get their bag because it had been misplaced with us. Urbano was not the one who initially grabbed the wrong bags but still made sure to help out.

title: Location Location
text: Beautiful hotel with some unfortunate technical difficulties. The staff upon checking in was friendly and helpful, there were some technical issues that caused my card to be overcharged, however the restaurant attached was lovely for a glass of wine and the coffee included in the morning was a great pick-me-up.

title: 100% Wonderful
text:
Everything about our stay was wonderful. Emily greeted us with a lovely welcome and made sure we were satisfied throughout our stay. 
The bartenders at both locations were very friendly and attentive. 
The rooms are very spacious for NYC - clean and comfortable as well. 
Housekeeping  so courteous. 
Loved our stay!

title: Mr. Urbano 10/10 recommend
text: Urbano was a great hostest.  He welcome us and assisted us with valet and our bags.  He made us feel at home away from home.  Driving all the way from  VA to New York to a warm greet added to our trip.  We are looking forward to our weekend stay!

title: Urbano is the absolute best!!
text: Urbano is amazing and made sure to make us feel at home. He helped us with our room and made sure my mom knew how to operate everything. This hotel is in a great and all of the staff are so friendly and helpful.

title: Urbano is the best!
text: Urbano was superb,  I stay at many kimptons throughout the years but I’ve never had anyone jump to help me get my bags and help me in the door.  Crucial as I just threw out my back yesterday.  Huge help getting them up to the room too.  Really appreciate him!

title: Wonderful Hotel/Fantastic People
text: From the moment we got there to the moment we left, it was just great! Our room was so inviting and comfortable. Shoutouts to the front desk...friendly from beginning to end, Ruth in housekeeping with warm greetings each day and an immaculate room, Trevor at the restaurants, who made us feel special and welcomed, such delicious food at both Skirt Steak and L'Amico and Will & Fernando for their great tips, help, the warmest greetings and conversation with both of them was always fun and funny! We will always stay here when we return to NYC and look forward to our next visit!

title: Very friendly staff and very clean rooms.
text: We had a great stay at the Kimpton Hotel.  We were there for 5 days and the staff was very friendly and helpful if we had any questions.  I want to say a big thank you to Will aka Handsom, Fernando and Rafael.  We would definitely stay at this hotel again.

title: Kimpton great experience
text: Really well run hotel…we loved the brunch indulgences at L’Amico and the staff was incredibly thoughtful and responsive, especially Urbano who helped us navigate the hotel and stored our luggage with a smile and the utmost courtesy.

title: Pleasant stay
text: Convenient location to stay that’s pretty central to everything. Very nice, clean and upscale property. Nice coffee shop on site. Urbano was very friendly and helpful during our stay! Definitely recommend!

title: Great customer service!
text: My stay started with a great welcome from Urbano. Urbano unloaded all of our belongings and made check-in a breeze. The restaurants on site were okay, but I wasn’t overly impressed. The room was immaculate with great views. All being said, I would definitely recommend; even if just for the customer service alone!

title: Great Customer Service!
text: This place is a great location to see all the sites!  Staff is very friendly.  A huge thank you to Will and Fernando who went above and beyond while we were staying there.  If we come to New York again, will definitely stay here!

title: Kimpton Eventi Hotel
text: Will and Urbano were extremely helpful and attentive! They helped bring my bags up to my room and greeted me very kindly when I entered the hotel. They were accommodating and attentive. I appreciated their service.

title: Chic hotel in great location with excellent customer service
text: Great location for going uptown and downtown. Trendy, with good sized rooms. The lobby staff was so helpful and excellent, especially Will, who helped us secure a car service going to a wedding upstate. Will got on the phone and had it all arranged with our bags in the car when we were ready. Will stay again when we are back in NY.

title: Will was AMAZING
text: Fantastic service made the trip - thanks Will! Great location for hotel - east to go up or downtown. So centrally located we decided to go to a Broadway 8 pm show at 7:35 and made it easily ;) would come back.

title: Eventi stay
text: Had a great experience the whole staff was great. Urbano and Will were stand outs. Very personable and friendly. Jen at the front desk was amazing as well. She was helpful in terms of making check in smooth and easy

title: Wonderful place to stay with Family
text: Urbano was amazing helping us here at Kimpton Eventi! He made our stay very pleasant! Hotel is beautiful,  comfortable and has great views! Bathroom is very comfortable and has everything you could need. Rooms are stunning and the space comfortable with a family of 4.

title: Siemens Sustainability Event
text: Will was awesome!  He took great care of me and my car,  Highly recommended Will & the Eventi if you are in the area.  Will greeted me on the street, took my car, gave me directions and even saved me from getting hit by a bike.  He is truly awesome!

title: Very well kept and quiet hotel with chill vibe
text: Spent a night here last minute and was very pleased. Rooms are decently sized, sheets and beds are amazing, and noise was relatively minimal. Will the bellhop was amazing. Traveled at least 100 nights the past year. Would stay again.

title: A friendly welcome
text: The service at the front lobby and genuine care for customers was exemplary from Mr Brooks. He was always helpful and made my day. Nothing was too much trouble and after a long day in Manhattan it felt like home.

title: Special Shout Out
text: This is our go-to hotel in Manhattan, and with good reason - the experience is always top-notch.  They really look out for their guests, the rooms are clean, the beds are comfortable, and the amenities and restaurants are excellent.  This is a special shout out to Will Baxter, who made sure we had a car reserved for our departure last Sunday afternoon, and walked us with our not-very-light luggage through gridlocked streets and sidewalks to meet the driver who had to park two blocks away due to 6th Avenue being closed for a festival.  Will also greeted us with a smile on his face throughout our four-day stay.

title: Beware of Incidental charge
text:
We had a great time. We were on the 23rd level, no noise. Everything went well on the trip. I’m writing this review as a warning to everyone who stayed here or is planning to. We were first told incidentals charge will be $400.00. No big deal, every hotel has this policy. About a month after, as I reviewed my credit card billing, Eventi Kimpton Hotel charged a $1328.13. I filed a complaint with my CC company, then called hotel. Melvin (manager) refunded the fee before I was off the phone.

This appears to be a common practice for this hotel. If you stayed here, review your credit card statements. It was in the manner this was handled. They knew what I was talking about and quickly transferred me to manager to address this…very concerning!

title: Will the Greeter was amazing!!!
text: Will is amazing and super helpful at the bell desk. Everyday when he greeted up he had a smile on his face and was happy to help! If you need directions to anything follow he lead he gives great guidance!

title: September in the City
text: The staff was exceptional but there was one person that went over and beyond for us every day! Will Brooks (works in the lobby area and wears many hats) was always SO friendly, helpful with directions and recommendations, and a smile on his face. Loved the location and cleanliness of our room. Thank you for a great US Open weekend!

title: Amazing customer service and hotel
text: We were so impressed by the Eventi hotel and its staff. Emily at the front desk, as well as Yaya, went above and beyond to make sure that we had an amazing stay. Emily remembered our name and even made sure my children were having the best time. Any time we had a request it was met in a timely manner. The rooms were so clean and had a very elegant modern touch to them. We will definitely stay here again when we visit NYC in the future.

title: Buyer Beware -- Stay Away From Kimpton!
text: Buyer Beware! My husband and I stayed at the Kimpton Hotel Eventi in January to attend his father's memorial service. The bellman had our luggage, including our carry ons on his cart when they were stolen -- someone grabbed them and ran. The hotel has the entire incident on video. Legally, the hotel is 200% responsible for the replacement of all of our stolen items (2 laptops, an iPad, all of my good jewelry including my engagement ring and marriage band, diamond earrings, etc.). The manager of the hotel never even had the courtesy to come down or apologize to us for our loss. The Kimpton insurance representative, Broadspire, has acknowledged that the hotel is absolutely responsible for our loss, but they've made us jump through hoops to document everything that was stolen (try documenting family heirloom jewelry -- but we did solely because my mother kept fabulous records and appraisals). It's now been 7-months since the theft and despite documenting *everything,* that was stolen, we've yet to receive a check or any communication from the hotel at all. It's clear that they're dragging their feet because they think we'll go away -- but we won't! Do not stay here! There are plenty of hotels in NYC. Do yourself a favor and stay somewhere that respects and treats their guests properly and with respect in times of trouble. To try and get out of reimbursing us what they legally owe us is slimy and shameful. We've already told our Forbes Top 25 travel agent about this and she's removed the Kimpton brand from her list of recommended hotels. Really people -- cross this chain off your list. This is no way to treat people who were robbed during broad daylight while their luggage and personal belongings were in possession of the hotel bellman. Stay somewhere else. If something bad or unfortunate should happen to you while you're a guest at a Kimpton, don't expect them to stand behind you or help you in any way. Again -- buyer beware!

title: Great experience
text: We stayed for eight nights at the Kimpton Hotel Eventi in New York; and loved it. Everything was perfect. The staff is exceptionally friendly and helpful. Especially Fernando made our stay incredibly memorable.

title: Great night with friends
text:
Will and Fernando absolutely made the visit worthwhile. They were super friendly and accommodating.  Highly recommend the hotel and adjacent restaurant, L'Amico. 
Modern yet steampunk decor made for lovely backdrops for photos.

title: Small gestures meant a lot!
text: Will & Fernando (front lobby) went out of their way to make our visit awesome. Truly appreciate their friendly and joyous demeanors. It’s not every day that you meet people who are willing to connect on a human level & help out with making special memories possible!

title: A+ stay
text: Will and Fernando provided excellent service upon check-in and throughout our stay.  We chose a rain shower suite. The room was comfortable and clean and the hotel location was convenient to Penn station.  The bartender Paulina  was also excellent, and made wonderful drinks.

title: Kimpton Eventi Service rocks
text: Will at the door provided amazing service. He helped us organize cars saw him always helping other guests with bags and hands-down I will stay nowhere else when I come to Midtown Manhattan.  What a great experience.

title: Perfect NYC  option
text: Great location, room, service and design. The staff were fantastic! We have stayed at the Eventi now for 3 years in a row when in NYC for the US OPEN and love it for it’s easy access to Penn Station and easy walk to high line, Hudson yards, soho, etc. We will be back!

title: Helpful Staff
text: Stayed at the Eventi prior to my sons move in day for college. We needed to have some documents notarized and signed by witnesses.  Fernando and Will who work the bell station were happy to help and were fantastic.  Thanks Fernando and Will you helped make our stay great.

title: Great hotel with great service!
text:
Great hotel! 

When we arrived at the hotel, we received a warm greeting and welcome by Will. He escorted us to the front desk. The front desk staff was very friendly and professional. After check in, we were great by Fernando who brought our luggage to the room and answered any questions we had. 
The entire staff was very polite and respectful. However, both Will and Fernando left lasting impressions. They provided us with not only great service but also helpful tips about New York City.

The next time we are in New York, we will definitely return to The Eventi Hotel!

title: Wonderful staff and gorgeous reprive from the concrete jungle
text: A lovely respite from the insanity of summer in the city.  Fernando, Will, JJ, and the gentleman by the elevators take care of your needs before you know you have them.  They cared for my family in from out of town while I had to work.  Can't wait to come back.  This is definitely my new home.

title: Warm and welcoming hotel with lovely rooms and excellent warm high service staff.
text: Lovely room and outstanding service. Special thanks to Will and Fernando for making us feel welcome and cared for. Will’s warmth is unforgettable! We appreciated the hotel’s communication when our room was ready. Reception staff managed a big crowd of checkins with grace and patience.

title: Hotel Eventi review
text: Had a great experience overall. Rooms are very spacious and well maintained. The location is also fantastic and the staff are also very helpful. Notable person was Will the doorman. Very helpful and kind.

title: Amazing stay
text: We had an amazing time here, and the staff were amazing especially Will!! Super chatty and accommodating made me and my family feel so welcome. The rooms were amazing and the location and view were perfect !

title: Super helpful!
text: Will at the front helped us with our luggage and finding transportation and was just so sweet and helpful! We were in town for a business trip and he made the end of our trip / getting to the train station such a breeze :)

title: Wonderful hospitality
text: Will at the front door was unbelievably professional, helpful and kind. He was on the ball and made us feel so welcome. All others we interacted with were also helpful and kind. Our first room had an AC issue and we were quickly accommodated and upgraded! Will come stay here again certainly.

title: Hotel comfortable with nice staff
text: Good location near many interesting places. Good staff, especially Fernando, really nice and helpful in any situation. My room was comfortable and at 22nd floor had a great view on the city. I will probably come again.

title: Exceptional home away from home!
text:
Exceptional stay at the beautiful Kimpton!
From the onset, the wonderful friendly staff tended our every need.  Our rooms were spacious, clean & bed super-comfy. 
Hotel is in a most convenient location.
Would highly recommend this fabulous NYC hotel.

title: Great City Stay
text: Great hotel in the heart of new york city Will, the doorman, took such great care of us and or car, and always with a smile! He made us feel very at home! Hotel is lovely and well located. Restaurant is great. We will be back!

title: Amazing service
text: William  Brooks the bellman is the best. So helpful and courteous. Was very patient with my crying kids. Beautiful hotel. Comfortable room. Nice location!!!!  Amenities were decent! I would recommend this hotel.

title: STAY HERE!! Beautiful Hotel - Wonderful Staff👍🏼❤️

Went out of their way to help us google map our way there and even called to make reservations!  They made us feel very welcomed at EVENTI!!

title: AMAZING!!!!!!
text:
Will was amazing, personable, courteous, and professional!!!!

The entire staff was amazing helpful and considerate 

This is my place of choice in NYC!!!!!

And I am from NYC

Food, staff, environment was GREAT!!!!

title: Fernando and Will are the Best!
text: Fernando and Will went above and beyond for us; they helped us get reservations at the restaurant next door that was completely booked ( the food was delicious)! From the moment we arrived they were quick & attentive and continuously went the extra mile. Thank you both & Kimpton Hotel!

title: Great trip to New York!
text: Comfortable room, good responsive service. The concierge and bellhops were all very helpful and kind. Room cleaning daily, good location, walkable to many areas including Chelsea Market, Nomad and Union Square.

title: Incredible staff & stay
text: The staff was absolutely phenomenal - gracious, not pretentious, and helpful. Every amenity was covered and comfortable. View and location are great. Would stay again without a doubt! The wine happy hour on he terrace is a great way to unwind when arriving.

title: Highly recommend - wonderful stay!
text: The hotel was great! The staff was friendly and extremely helpful. Our room was clean and well-appointed and the bed was comfortable. We enjoyed the wine reception and special attention to details. Highly recommend this lovely hotel!

title: Pleasantly surprised
text: Fernando and Will extremely courteous and very professional. They greeted us upon arrival and sent us off with smile as we departed. Very grateful for their kindness and willingness to help. I would highly recommend the hotel solely based on the hospitality of all the staff.

title: Kimpton Eventi Staff
text: All the staff at the Kimpton Eventi are very friendly and helpful. Fernando and Will are exceptional bell hops. Always ready to help in anyway they can!  Love staying at the Kimpton Eventi and I look forward to coming back soon!

title: Love the Kimpton Eventi!
text: Loved our stay at the Kimpton Eventi.  The midtown location is so convenient to everything you want to do in NYC.  The staff was excellent across the board from front desk to housekeeping.  And a special shout out to  Will who went out of his way to make our stay extra special.  Super helpful, warm, friendly and professional.  Thank you Will!

title: Loved the hotel
text: The hotel and staff were great. Will, Derek, and Fernando were the best. They made sure we had a great stay. I felt like they really out did themselves making sure we had a great weekend. Housekeeping was very punctual and even when I needed help at 3am, I was no bother.

title: Consistent Customer Service #1 in Mid-town NYC.
text: Everyone was so kind and helpful.  From the front desk staff to the gentleman that helped with the luggage.  This is my 5th time staying at the Eventi hotel and I love it.  The staff at the Eventi are very consistent with good helpful service.  Will helped me tremendously with all my luggage because I was struggling.  He was so nice.  I will be staying at Eventi again, for sure.

title: Great hotel with helpful staff and welcoming to pets.
text:
Especially would like to recognize Will, who was extremely helpful with our luggage. It made me feel very welcome… Including cleaning up the water I spilled all over the elevator and the lobby.

The hotel overall is beautiful, clean and comfortable. The Kimpton always welcomes pets, without additional fees the location is a little busy and loud, but it’s only a couple of blocks walk to the flatiron District, which is very nice.

title: Great for Traveling with Dogs
text: We traveled with our little dog on this trip. This is predominantly the reason why I picked the hotel. The location is great as Madison Square park is close by and lots of options to eat outdoors around the hotel. The gym has Pelotons and is a pretty good size. We enjoyed the free wine everyday during happy hour. We ate at both restaurants onsite and enjoyed them. The room was spacious with a king bedroom and sliding door that separated the living room.

title: Great hotel for people and pups
text: What a fantastic hotel! From the moment we pulled up Will and Fernando made us feel totally welcome. Accommodations are upgraded, clean, spacious and quiet.  Excellently located. Kimpton takes the top slot for our #1 hotel in NYC.

title: Another great stay
text:
We have been to the Eventi Kimpton at least 6 or 7 times.  We found the hotel by chance, but its now our go-to hotel in the city.  The location is perfect, its about a 5-10 min walk from Penn Station/Moynihan Hall.    The main reason we keep coming back is that the staff is excellent, from the management to the front desk, to the bell team.  We are always warmly welcomed and made to feel at home.  This time, we were celebrating our 10th wedding anniversary, and Victoria was amazing in setting a few things for up ahead of time.  When we checked in, Celine, from the front desk, was extremely welcoming and helpful.    

Certainly, we will continue to come back whenever we are in New York.

title: Great home base for the weekend.
text:
We enjoyed our time! A particular bright spot for us was Will at the front door. The moment we pulled up he was quick to help us avoid disaster in the bike lane. A great personality to return to and even going the extra mile to help us with dinner reservations. 

And of course the food was good and rooms lovely, but it is the personality and personal touches that make a place stand out.

title: Eventi is my NYC home away from home
text: Absolutely love the Eventi — my New York home away from home. Francisco is the best — so warm and welcoming every time we see him; feels like family! Ideal location, spacious rooms, and the onsite Amico restaurant is excellent. Thank you, Francisco and team Eventi!

title: Modern, Friendly, Clean Hotel with Lovely Large Rooms in Great Location
text:
Stayed here for 4 nights whilst meeting up with family who were staying just round the corner. m
Hotel in a great mid-town location and has a very modern/ friendly/ upbeat vibe.
All the staff were really friendly and helpful when trying to get a cab/ printing boarding passes for flight home. 
Room was great - I requested a high floor and got one on floor 22 of 23 so was happy with that. Room was at the back of the hotel so didn't get all the noise of 6th Avenue... it was generally quiet bar a few sirens from streets below, but hey it's NYC.
Size of room was great - large compared to other NYC hotel rooms I've seen/ stayed in. Floor to ceiling windows gave great views and great light in the room. Bathroom was very large. Aircon great.  All very clean and serviced daily - thanks Ruth.

title: Obsessed with Eventi!
text: The Kimpton Eventi Hotel in NYC exceeded all expectations with its exceptional service, ensuring a truly memorable stay. The hotel's beautiful aesthetic was a delightful blend of modern elegance and artistic charm, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere. What truly set this hotel apart was its uniqueness; from the stylish decor to the thoughtful amenities, it offered a one-of-a-kind experience. Furthermore, its perfect location in the heart of NYC allowed for easy access to all the city's iconic attractions, making it an ideal choice for any traveler.

title: A wonderful stay with the best service
text:
Wonderful service, beautiful rooms! Loved Francisco - he was great with my kids and incredibly helpful as well. 

The check in process was amazing as well - the woman was thoughtful, patient and engaging. 

Gorgeous lobby, good food selections on site and right in the heart of the city. 

We had two rooms (two kids) and they were both great. Spacious with everything we needed! We’ll be back.

title: Oasis in midtown
text: We stayed here for 3 days in July. The rooms were very clean and quiet. It’s close to Koreatown, Macy’s, Bryant Park, and Penn Station.  The staff were kind and helpful. The morning doorman took photos for us and warned us about the fast coming bicyclists.  I would stay here again.

title: Pass
text: Just OK. Elevators smelled like sewage every single day. Air conditioner didn't work. We were hot for 5 days. TV connection was super shady but the engineers fixed it immediately. Booked a suite and was enticed to purchase a bigger suite with a better view for the low low price of $50/nt. Yeah, we made it to the 9th floor (out of 20+ stories) overlooking a concrete gravel Construction pit. Checkin was seamless and they were nice. (except for the mean crew checking the fire alarm.So nasty so rude). Housekeeping was stellar. Doormen great and we felt safe. Minibar offerings were dusty and subpar. Please check your expiration dates. And, IT WAS SO LOUD. We didn't get a decent night's sleep. Not the hotel's fault in a city that never sleeps, but holy moly. Sirens, yelling, traffic ALL NIGHT EVERY NIGHT. Pro: separate room for children and the hotel made up  the sofa bed. Room is separated by a barn/sliding door for privacy. Bathroom was 10/10. Wouldn't stay here again.

title: Special thank you to Will, Yaya and Dino! They made my stay exceptional and I will 10000% recommend Kimpton Chelsea
text: I have stayed at numerous hotels and by far Kimpton Chelsea has the BEST and OUTSTANDING staff. Extremely attentive, caring, professional, and goes over and beyond for guests! I felt loved and appreciated as a guest during my stay. Special thank you to Will, Yaya and Dino - They made my stay exceptional and I will 10000% recommend Kimpton Chelsea to any friends and family that visit New York. To anyone thinking about booking... DO IT, You wont regret. Yaya, Will, and Dino will take amazing care of you. LOVE this hotel!!!!! I wish all hotels had staff this friendly and caring. Thank you for making my stay amazing!!!

title: rude duty manager, air conditioner blow hot air in summer in room
text:
we stayed 04 nights with kids in 02 interconnecting rooms, and rooms air con system is not working properly and when we made a complain, duty manager said, "we cannot fix it, also we cannot do anything about it". we felt like abonded!! 
rooms has not even a Kettle and upon request they provided a kettle to one room which was not working, we asked to replace and guest services informed, no more kettles available! no food or room menu is available inside rooms! 
hotel is like a most expansive pansion!.
bathroom sinks were blocked! 
8 dollars water bottle in room and no complimentary water!
will never stay in this property again... 
i dont want manager to reply to my email, because it is waste of time... they wont improve... 
Very Rude duty manager!

title: Great stay—I’ll come again
text: A great IHG hotel.  I stay in IHG hotels a lot because I love the bedding, pillows, mattresses, A/C, and basically know I’ll be able to sleep well in them.  This one also had truly great food—I had both the hotel breakfast and the lunch in the D’Amico restaurant in the lobby so far— and also it has really pretty marble bathrooms.  Staff are helpful and friendly.  I highly recommend.

title: Cool, clean, great location, exceptional service and staff!
text: We stayed at Hotel Eventi as a last minute find after Airbnb canceled our apartment. Airbnb was a nightmare experience but hotel Eventi and their staff saved our NYC portion of our vacation. The hotel was clean and in perfect location for NYC. We were in the action of the city and a safe part of the city. The staff was awesome and accommodating with all our requests including putting all of us on the frame floor. Celine was awesome and I appreciated all their time in our chaotic situation. The restaurants in the hotel are great and they poured good drinks, which was much needed in a family vacation. Thank you Hotel Eventi..you saved the day and will always get our business while in town!

title: Amazing Stay
text:
What a great stay! Jennifer at the front desk looks just like Idina Mendel. She welcomed us, recognized our status and after I gave the Kimpton “secret phrase” , she pulled out a pinwheel for me to spin for prizes. I had 2 rooms, so I spun twice and won two continental breakfasts and 12,000 points. She also upgraded us to a higher room and checked us in 2 hours early. Finally, a couple walked up to us and gave us 3 free drink vouchers. Wow, we felt like we won the lottery! We were 2  middle-aged straight  couples. We were warmly welcomed to the free wine/DJ drag party in the back patio. There were pride flag, sunglasses and other giveaways. We had a blast before our dinner reservations. 
Our waiter in the am told us we could order a full egg, potato, tomato, and salad plate, and coffee for our “ continental breakfast” voucher. Delicious. 
The  young men working in the lobby and the front parking were friendly and very very welcoming. They joked with us and could not do enough for us. The rooms were clean and sleek, the usual small NY size with a double size amazing rain head shower and teak stool. 
The bartended in the attached private restaurant could not have been more professional or kinder! 
We will be back to you NY Kimpton Eventi because you were warm, fun and soo friendly. Thank you,
Susan Brown and Jim Scott

title: Great location in mid-town for a sleek, well-run hotel
text:
We were lucky that Kimpton was running a sale that coincided with a weekend we were going to be in Manhattan so we snagged a good value on a three night stay. It turned out to be an excellent choice. The 5-star rating is for overall value, style and functionality (not for luxury).

The hotel was full so they could not accommodate an upgrade for our Platinum IHG status but we did end up in a corner room on the 20th floor (out of 23, I think). We had windows that gave us a view of the top part of the Empire State Building and the gold top of the New York Life building. (see photos). The room was a decent size by Manhattan standards and had a super luxurious, large shower with rain head + strong hand-held sprays. There was also a large desk, a mini-fridge, a safe and robes. Oddly, the safe could not fit my 15" Mac Air laptop.

The hotel offered a complimentary wine happy hour from 5-6 pm on a rooftop terrace. Very nice. The staff were competent and helpful throughout.

One of the advantages of the Kimpton's location for us was that it was an easy walk with rolling luggage from Penn Station, an easy walk to various subway stations, and is adjacent to Koreatown which, of us, was really fun, with tons of tasty dining and dessert options.

title: Very Nice Hotel
text:
5 night stay here whilst on holiday. Check in desk welcoming & professional. Lovely room with lots of space  on the 23rd floor, great views, comfortable bed, fantastic walk in shower, no complaints at all!
Good location for subway stations although walking to the attractions may be a little far for some. Concierge desk very good, answered every question we had and put us on the correct subway line every morning!
Had breakfast twice in the hotel and although very nice, it was a little expensive.
We would stay here again

title: Great Stay at Hotel Eventi
text: Had a wonderful stay at Hotel Eventi over MDW! The room was gorgeous with a beautiful view of the Empire State Building and was very clean and well kept. The staff were on-point throughout and very courteous through our stay - the service we received from Dino was notably amazing. He was very friendly and quick to take care of our bags and help us with directions several times during our stay. Can’t wait to come back!

title: Convenient location and excellent front desk staff
text: Frequently stay at the Eventi, but was motivated to submit a review specifically for my most recent stay to give a special shout-out to the front desk staff, especially Celine. She was exceptionally friendly and warm, and efficiently accommodated my somewhat complex reservation needs.

title: Confirmed reservations are not honored here
text: Never had a hotel ever not honor a reservation. The hotel started by letting us know that even though our membership entities to upgrades when available, that was not possible. Then they told us they did not have any more rooms that fit our confirmed reservation. But if we still wanted a room they could make room for us if we agreed to pay for an upgrade. Then they could magically find us a room. I guess that is their definition of taking care of their valued members.

title: Dino was wonderful
text: I just stayed there with my parents who are in their 80s.  Dino was SO nice to us - carried our luggage, helped us to the car, asked about our day, etc. Most importantly, he treated my parents with respect, grace, and patience. I’m so appreciative.

title: Great visit and stay
text:
I was here on a work visit and was initially given 2205. Check in was smooth, and available at noon for me (possibly because it was through my company).

The room itself was great, clean and comfortable. However, this room shared a wall with the maintenance elevator and was subject to repeated thumping souds, possibly from the elevator doors. I asked to be relocated, and was then given a room on the 16th floor, where I happily spent the next few days.

With a view of the Empire State building, the room was extremely comfortable. The washroom was stocked with the basics and were sufficient for me. The safe worked well and proved to be quite useful since I wasn't keen on carrying anything more than 1 credit card when heading out.

1 thing to note: I was provided snacks from my company, but the staff assumed I had made use of the minibar and charged me for the items. However, they did resolve this almost instantly, but this is more of an FYI.

With a max 30 min walk time to Times Square, this hotel made for a great stay, especially if you plan on catching a broadway show or want to go to The Edge.

title: Another enjoyable stay at the Eventi
text:
I have stayed at the Eventi multiple times and it has always been a pleasant experience.  The hotel has a great vibe and is in a great location in Chelsea - walking distance to Penn Station and multiple subway lines so you can get anywhere you need without a taxi.  

Rooms are decent sized and the beds are very comfortable.  I had a nice view this time.  Other times I’ve stayed here I didn’t, but instead of staring at the city from the window your should be out in it anyway!

Only complaint I have is not with the Eventi, but with most NYC hotels— resort/amenity fees are getting absolutely ridiculous.  Those ‘amenities’ used to be included.  These ‘required’ fees are just a poorly veiled attempt to suck more money from travelers.  It’s a scourge on the industry.

title: Very good !
text: The hotel is very well located on the 6th ave. the room we had was very clean, on the upper floors, so the view was wonderful. The bed was a piece from heaven. the cleaning staff was responsive and attentive. the doormen were smiling, the reception staff were not very welcoming, a bit cold and condescending except one of frontdesk managers (tall and thin). Next to the hotel, there are shops for small groceries, small restaurants which is very practical. Thank you.

title: Great place - guest experience A++
text: Really enjoyed this hotel -  the room was wonderful & the ability to have parking so close made it easy coming from Boston.  Restaurants on site were good too!  I also had an awesome experience with Melvin at the front desk recently.  I needed a folio post stay for my company expense & I was having trouble getting it (seems like it was an email issue on my side).  He made sure I got it & was patient in sending it to 3 different email addresses.  Saved the day for me & was upbeat and happy to do so!  Feels like they really care about their guests.  Valet team was great too!

title: Lovely hotel, disappointing staff
text:
A lovely hotel, great room (paid for an upgrade to a King Suite) as travelling with 2 x kids. The fold out bed wasn’t that comfortable for an adult but fine for kids. Location good for getting around however quite close to a grotty area where you would get the train. 

After reading how friendly the staff are I found quite the opposite. I found them extremely unwelcoming. When we arrived at 4:30pm the room wasn’t ready and we had barely an apology, kids were exhausted and I had bad travel sickness and needed a glass of water. I was told to go across the street and buy some from 7/11!!! 
USBs didn’t work on my side of the bed and engineer was unable to fix. Jet bath didn’t work.
They booked me a transfer to JFK, very expensive and the driver wanted more money as paying in card which was not told about. They charged and extra $20 for booster seats.

The breakfast downstairs was really good and worked out to be good value when sharing with the kids. We didn’t have breakfast included.

Overall the room was a good size and comfortable, however let down by the unfriendly staff

title: Fun and modern hotel
